items.summary: Update the Home page media section (frontend/src/components/site/VideoSection.tsx) to promote the Instagram account `kkeuroexpress_banga` by changing the section copy to “Watch our videos on Instagram” (English) and adding a clear outbound link/button that opens the Instagram profile at `https://instagram.com/kkeuroexpress_banga` in a new tab.

Add an Instagram link in the site footer (frontend/src/components/site/SiteFooter.tsx) that points to `https://instagram.com/kkeuroexpress_banga` and clearly labels the handle in English (e.g., “Instagram: @kkeuroexpress_banga”).
